Title: Contact with valid data
Steps:
1. Open Contact Us form
2. Enter valid Email, Name, Message ≤ 500 chars
3. Click Send

Title: Contact with special chars / different languages
Steps:
1. Open form
2. Enter valid Email, Name with special chars / foreign languages
3. Enter message with symbols
4. Click Send
Expected Result: Message sent successfully, characters displayed correctly

Title: Invalid email format
Steps:
1. Open form
2. Enter invalid Email
3. Fill Name + Message
4. Click Send
Expected Result: Error: "Please enter a valid email address"

Title: Empty Name
Steps:
1. Open form
2. Leave Name empty
3. Enter valid Email + Message
4. Click Send

Title: Empty Message
Steps:
1. Open form
2. Leave Message empty
3. Enter valid Email + Name
4. Click Send

Title: Message length > 500 chars
Steps:
1. Open form
2. Enter valid Email + Name
3. Enter Message > 500 chars
4. Click Send

Title: Empty Email
Steps:
1. Open form
2. Leave Email empty
3. Fill Name + Message
4. Click Send

Title: Contact Form Validation
Steps: 1. Open form                                2. Click “Send message” without filling any fields
Expected Result: Message should not be sent and validation alert should appear (“Please fill out this field”)
Actual Result: Message is sent and “Thanks for the message!!” appears even though fields are empty

Title: Click "Send Message" button twice
Precondition: User is on Contact page with valid data filled in
Steps:
1. Fill all required fields with valid data.
2. Click "Send Message" button twice quickly
Expected Result: Only one alert appears and the message is sent once only.
Actual Result: Only one alert appears, message sent once.
